comments.content: The title must be **[Gotham (Thin)](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725132752/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Hoefler%2BFrere-Jones&ffam=Gotham%20-%20Thin&fid=4f47f6ef04d5ed095d66e95741382d9d&fsize=36&text=OPTIC%20THE%20FIRST%20PLATFORM%20OF%20ITS%20KIND%20takes%20a%20fresh%20approach.%20Rather%2C%20it's%20a%20simple%20connection&wrap=2)** by Hoefler&Co [2003] and the text body looks like a heavier weight of Gotham
